summary: Bacharuddin Jusuf Habibie , was the president of Indonesia from May 21, 1998 to October 20, 1999.
full_text: Bacharuddin Jusuf Habibie  pronunciation  FREng  is an Indonesian engineer who was President of Indonesia from 1998 to 1999. He succeeded Suharto, who resigned in 1998. His presidency is seen as a transition to the post-Suharto era. Upon becoming president, he liberalised Indonesia's press and political party laws, and held an early democratic election in 1999, which resulted in the end of his presidency. His presidency was the third, and the shortest, after independence.
title: Bacharuddin Jusuf Habibie
